DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis use 3-D laparoscopic vision system ( Viking Systems , La Jolla , CA ) significantly improve technical ability complex laparoscopic task experimental model .
DOC.detailed_description: 7 task 3-D laparoscopic instrument fit trainer box subjective criterion ( 4 point lickert scale ) evaluate study . Totally twenty-four participant ( 8 experience , 8 minimal experience 8 novice ) evaluate different 10 task ( touch mark circle , pas two circle needle , pick-beads place , grape suture , move needle one instrument another instrument , pick-and-place , cutting , three different suture ) term total task time error number . Statistical Package Program use perform statistical analysis . The data present arithmetic mean standard deviation calculate group . A P value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: medical doctor disable person ( arm vision problem )
